definition: Petrified forest scenic area in Shilin Yi autonomous county 石林彞族自治縣|石林彝族自治县[Shi2 lin2 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4] in Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 独秀峰位于桂林王城内，是王城景区不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: Area Serai, intertwined vines and plant species richness.
sentences.chinese: 景区林郁苍茏，藤蔓交织，植物物种丰富。

sentences.english: Finally some suggestions were proposed to perfect tourist interpretation of Cuihuashan National Geopark.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了翠华山景区旅游解说完善的建议。

sentences.english: Yesterday, , we went to a big family picnic Dishuiyan Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我们一大家子去滴水岩风景区里野餐。

sentences.english: The scenic spots are mainly scattered in Lijiang County and Ninglang County.
sentences.chinese: 该景区主要分布在丽江县和宁蒗县。

sentences.english: The man-made water system wanders 7 kilometers long, reaching every corner of the scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒七公里长的人工水系四通八达环绕着整个景区。

sentences.english: Well, I call on you to join with me visit the famous East Lake Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 好，下面请大家随我一起去游览著名的东湖风景区。

sentences.english: A couple point out sites on massive map along a wall in Mount Kumgang resort.
sentences.chinese: 一对姐妹在金刚山景区巨幅地图前找位置。

sentences.english: Kyushu-ching Yuanmingyuan scenic feast is the largest construction group.
sentences.chinese: 九州清宴是圆明园景区中最大的建筑群。

sentences.english: Belongs to the desert of natural scenic spot, is a crescent hill chain or division high landscape.
sentences.chinese: 属于沙漠类自然风景区，为新月形丘链或格状丘地貌。

sentences.english: At every resting-place in the scenic area, Rock Tea is available to tourists.
sentences.chinese: 在风景区的每一休息处，游人都能买得到岩茶。

sentences.english: Development of the landscape around the sea, beautiful scenery, is one of the well - known scenic spot .
sentences.chinese: 周围海蚀地貌发育，景色绮丽，是著名的风景区之一。

sentences.english: Small cottages are available for visitors who wish to spend the night.
sentences.chinese: 如果想在此过夜，景区还可以向你提供小别墅。

sentences.english: Which intrested places have you been to around Beijing?
sentences.chinese: 北京周边的景区你去过哪些？

sentences.english: The aim was to reveal the evolutions of soil environment quality around Huashan scenic spots and its pollution characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 揭示花山景区附近土壤环境质量演变状况及污染特点。

sentences.english: Paths just outside the hotel's doors lead up into the scenic Flatiron Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 就在酒店的门路径导致到熨斗山景区。

pinyin: guo2 jia1 lu:3 you2 du4 jia4 qu1

definition: red tourism, focused on sites in China associated with the Communist Revolution
